participant_1.background:
My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i hate the taste of fish.
i am really short.
i am a happy person.

participant_2.background:
I moved because I wanted to be closer to my new love.
i dyed my hair pink.
i am very good at math and science.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.

content.text: Hello! I hope your day is going well!
Hey there! It is going pretty well, thank you! And yours?
It is going good! I'm just hanging out at home today.
Sounds relaxing. I am at the gym working out.
That's awesome! I'm not really a gym person myself.
Well you should come check out my gym! It's really great.
I might just do that! I'm not really from around here, so I'm always looking for new places to go.
Well the gym is in New Mexico.
That's a long ways away! I'm in California.
Wow! Well that's a long drive.
Yeah, it is. I'm actually moving to New Mexico soon.
Oh that's exciting! What are you moving for?
I'm moving for a new job. I'm going to be teaching math and science at a local high school.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Well I'm glad to hear things are going well for you! I hope your move goes smoothly!
